research_content:
Perfect. Now I have comprehensive information for all five Pacific states. Here is the structured research data:

## California
- **Agency:** California Department of Veterans Affairs (CalVet)
- **Address:** 1227 O Street, Sacramento, CA 95814
- **Phone:** (800) 952-5626 (Toll-Free) | TDD: (800) 324-5966 | Outside CA: (800) 221-8998
- **Website:** https://www.calvet.ca.gov/
- **Regional/District Offices:**
  - Oakland District Office: 1301 Clay Street, Room 1130N, Oakland, CA 94612 | (510) 286-0627 | Hours: 9:00 a.m. - 3:00 p.m. (Tues, Wed, Thu)
  - Los Angeles District Office: 11000 Wilshire Boulevard, Room 506, Los Angeles, CA 90024 | (213) 620-2755 | Hours: By Appointment (Mon–Thu 8 a.m.–2 p.m.)
  - San Diego District Office: 8620 Spectrum Center Blvd Rm 725, San Diego, CA 92123 | (619) 857-5497 | Hours: 8:30 a.m. – 4:00 p.m. (Tues, Wed, Thu)
  - County Veteran Service Offices (CVSOs) in all 58 counties (searchable at https://www.calvet.ca.gov/find-a-service-provider)

## Oregon
- **Agency:** Oregon Department of Veterans' Affairs (ODVA)
- **Address:** 700 Summer Street NE, Salem, OR 97301
- **Phone:** (503) 373-2051 | Toll-Free: (1-800-828-8801)
- **Website:** https://www.oregon.gov/odva/
- **Hours:** Monday - Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.
- **Regional/County Offices:**
  - 36 counties with over 70 State and County Veteran Service Officers
  - Examples include:
    - Deschutes County: Mike Maier Building, 1130 N.W. Harriman St, Bend, OR 97701 | (541) 385-3214
    - Washington County: 5240 NE Elam Young Parkway, Suite 300, Hillsboro, OR 97124 | (503) 846-3060
  - Complete county directory available at: https://www.oregon.gov/odva/services/pages/county-veteran-services-offices.aspx

## Washington
- **Agency:** Washington State Department of Veterans Affairs (WDVA)
- **Address:** 1102 Quince Street SE, PO Box 41150, Olympia, WA 98504
- **Phone:** (360) 725-2200 | Toll-Free: (1-800-562-2308)
- **Email:** benefits@dva.wa.gov
- **Website:** https://www.dva.wa.gov/
- **Hours:** Monday - Friday, 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.
- **Additional Services:**
  - County-specific offices located through county map at: https://www.dva.wa.gov/resources/county-map
  - Four State Veteran Homes: Port Orchard, Orting, Spokane, and Walla Walla

## Alaska
- **Agency:** Alaska Department of Military & Veterans Affairs (DMVA) / Alaska Office of Veterans Affairs
- **Address:** Camp Danali, Building 49000, Room C-211, P.O. Box 5800, Fort Richardson, Alaska 99505
- **Phone:** (907) 428-6016
- **Website:** https://dmva.alaska.gov/ (Military & Veterans Affairs) and https://veterans.alaska.gov/ (Alaska Office of Veterans Affairs)
- **Regional/County Offices:**
  - Specific regional office locations not readily available through public search results
  - Contact main office or visit official websites for current regional office information

## Hawaii
- **Agency:** Hawaii Office of Veterans' Services (OVS)
- **Address:** 459 Patterson Road (Tripler), E-Wing, Room 1-A103, Honolulu, HI 96819
- **Phone:** (808) 433-0420
- **Email:** ovs@ovs.hawaii.gov
- **Website:** https://dod.hawaii.gov/ovs/
- **Hours:** Monday – Friday, 7:45 a.m. – 4:30 p.m. | Closed for lunch 12:00 p.m. – 1:00 p.m.
- **County/Island Branch Offices:**
  - Maui County (includes Moloka'i): Kahului
  - West Oahu: Kapolei
  - Kauai County: Lihue
  - Hawaii County (Big Island): Hilo
  - All islands use same email and website for contact

---

**Sources:**
- [California Department of Veterans Affairs - CalVet Contact](https://www.calvet.ca.gov/contact)
- [CalVet District Offices](https://www.calvet.ca.gov/VetServices/Pages/District-Offices.aspx)
- [CalVet Service Provider Search](https://www.calvet.ca.gov/find-a-service-provider)
- [Oregon Department of Veterans' Affairs - Agency Directory](https://www.oregon.gov/odva/connect/pages/agency-directory.aspx)
- [Oregon County Veteran Services Offices](https://www.oregon.gov/odva/services/pages/county-veteran-services-offices.aspx)
- [Washington State Department of Veterans Affairs - Contact Us](https://www.dva.wa.gov/about-wdva/contact-us)
- [Alaska DMVA Home](https://dmva.alaska.gov/)
- [Alaska Office of Veterans Affairs - Contact Us](https://veterans.alaska.gov/contact-us)
- [Hawaii Office of Veterans' Services - Contact](https://dod.hawaii.gov/ovs/contact/)
- [Hawaii Office of Veterans' Services Main Page](https://dod.hawaii.gov/ovs/)
agentId: a604d15 (for resuming to continue this agent's work if needed)
